message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have the smaller share, but I'll be the one to decide how it's split!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. But I'm willing to give you a bit more... this time.
I'm not giving in yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Meet me halfway!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a tiny bit more... don't expect me to go easy on you!
